TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit RayHitTestResult extends System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult
Public MustInherit Class RayHitTestResult Inherits HitTestResult
public ref class RayHitTestResult abstract : System::Windows::Media::HitTestResult

summary.span: Représente le résultat d’un test de positionnement le long d’un rayon.

span.span: Represents the result of a hit test along a ray.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si un rayon atteignent un , vous pouvez effectuer un cast en une instance de pour obtenir des informations encore plus détaillées sur l’intersection.If a ray hits a , you can cast to an instance of to get even more detailed information about the intersection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DistanceToRayOrigin As Double
public: abstract property double DistanceToRayOrigin { double get(); };

summary.span: Obtient la distance entre l’intersection et l’espace de coordonnées internes du qui a initialisé le test de positionnement.

span.span: Gets the distance between the hit intersection and the inner coordinate space of the which initiated the hit test.

value.span: Valeur double qui indique la distance entre l’intersection et l’espace de coordonnées internes du qui a initialisé le test de positionnement.

span.span: Double that indicates the distance between the hit intersection and the inner coordinate space of the which initiated the hit test.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ModelHit As Model3D
public: property System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Model3D ^ ModelHit { System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Model3D ^ get(); };

summary.span: Obtient le point de croisement entre le Model3D et le rayon utilisé pour effectuer le test de positionnement.

span.span: Gets the Model3D intersected by the ray along which the hit test was performed.

value.span: Point de croisement entre le Model3D et le rayon.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PointHit As Point3D
public: abstract property System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Point3D PointHit { System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Point3D get(); };

summary.span: Obtient le Point3D à l’intersection entre le rayon le long duquel le test de positionnement a été effectué et l’objet atteint.

span.span: Gets the Point3D at the intersection between the ray along which the hit test was performed and the hit object.

value.span: Point3D correspondant à l’intersection entre l’objet et le rayon.

span.span: Point3D at which the hit object was intersected by the ray.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VisualHit As Visual3D
public: property System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Visual3D ^ VisualHit { System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Visual3D ^ get(); };

summary.span: Obtient le point de croisement entre l’élément visuel et le rayon utilisé pour effectuer le test de positionnement.

span.span: Gets the Visual intersected by the ray along which the hit test was performed.

value.span: Point de croisement entre Visual3D et le rayon.
